description:
While Hela experiments on Solex, Dr. K and his alien boss launch an attack on the Botties pit. Raska shows up expressing her concern for their safety and offers Hela the Robix Corp facilities for her research. The Botties go to Robix Corp, where they are treated like royalty until a new robot goes berserk and put them all in danger!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Wana ni Ki o Tsukero! Combock
罠に気をつけろ! コンボック
